body.name: Palmolive Essential Clean Liquid Dish Soap, Apple Pear, 14.2 Ounce
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 13 hrs 14 mins
features: Dishwasher pods that tackle 48 hour stuck on food and power through baked on messes
Enzyme-powered dishwashing pods formula with stain removal; no pre-wash or rinse aid needed
99.9% biodegradable formula, free of parabens, phosphates and chlorine bleach; no added fragrance
Packaging made with 25% post-consumer recycled material
Tough on Grease, Gentle on Planet
body.description: Palmolive PowerPacs Dishwasher Detergent Pods, No Added Fragrance - 36 Count (Pack of 1)

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #7,563 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #42 in Dishwasher Detergent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does its job.
reviews.reviewText: It's my 2nd order, - as some people complained, - couple pods might be smashed, it's true. But you still can use it. I think value for $ is quite good, so I'm not super upset about 1 or 2 smashed pods (which are still can be used).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Almost every pod was broken open and so I got a bag full of empty pods and detergent everywhere.
reviews.reviewText: Horrible product - I had read reviews that some people had said their pods were broken but still usable so for the price I thought, why not? Well, I received my pods and when I opened the bag, it was just empty plastic pods and a bag full of loose detergent. Lovely. Worst part is, this product is NONREFUNDABLE AND RETURNABLE so I'd say save the 10 bucks and just pay a little more for a product whose reviews don't say that they are broken open or else you could be like me that gets a bag where they are literally all but 1 broken open and unusable. :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally! An unscented dishwashing detergent!
reviews.reviewText: Usually use cascade gel and more recently cascade tablets. While the tablets clean well, they leave a strong detergent smell on everything, especially on my dishwasher safe food storage containers (plastics hold smells better it seems). The lemon scent cascade is less strong than their ‘fresh’ scent, but it was still annoying to smell and sometimes taste detergent on the food i kept in those containers.Discovered the palmolive unscented tabs here, just did a load in the dishwasher - cleans just as well as cascade, and just as importantly, does not leave the smell of detergent on what was washed!!! This will be my new brand! Well done, palmolive - well done…3/6/22 UPDATE - so like one of the other reviewers, i've recently received two orders of the 60 pack size (at least a few months apart) where the small green liquid 'wings' portion of each pod has burst open, dried up or leaked out into the bag. maybe amazon hasn't been storing these properly and they're sensitive to heat? i've still be using them, and so far doesn't seem to clean less effectively, but time will tell. i've e-mail palmolive about it, to see if it matters or if it can be avoided somehow. assuming they respond, i'll post their response.4/9/22 update - ok, probably too much time spent on dishwashing tablets, but final update (probably) - palmolive responded about a week after an email, they asked for purchase info, lot #, etc, said they’d look into it. They basically said that without the little green liquid sides the tabs still work fine, just not as well. I asked, but they didn’t tell me specifically what the green liquid in the ‘wings’ section does, just gave me some marketing speak about the tablets effectiveness in general. Anyway, in my own experience, i’ve noticed that the tabs that don’t have the green liquid MAYBE don’t wash quite as well (had 1 or 2 instances of some tiny bits of dried food stuck on even after the wash), but for the most part, the tabs still work, as they noted. In any case, this hasn’t deterred me from keeping this as my go to dishwashing product, and i give credit to them for being responsive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Half the packages come with a broken pod, messy but works fine
reviews.reviewText: I've ordered this about 4 times. I think in terms of washing and convenience, it's great. But the last 2 packages I had, were a powdery mess. Clearly a pod broke open. Amazon or manufacturer, needs to think of a better way to handle it. The value however is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The pods were all ripped open so there’s bits of dish detergent powder everywhere. While they still work to clean my dishes, we get the dust all over our hands with each load while trying to pop them into dishwasher. External bag and packaging were not damaged, just each individual pod

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have been using this for several months and it is a good buy.
reviews.reviewText: I have a new dishwasher so my experience may vary from others. The current dishwasher I have is a basic GE dishwasher, I forget the model. But trust me it is one of the cheapest models available. But after using these dishwashing pods for over three months, I have to say that these clean very well. It doesn’t leave any strong scents behind, which I appreciate and it cleans grimy dishes that have stuck on food. Usually I run my dishwasher once a week since I have a small household. If these are on sale again, I will repurchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars WILL NEVER BUY AGAIN
reviews.reviewText: These are awful! We just had these delivered from Amazon last week and half the bag was busted open and powder was leaking everywhere! They were dried up with no scent! Of course they are not eligible to return to amazon so now they will be thrown in the trash and we have wasted money! NEVER again.
Decent soap it does the job
